x[upper.tri(x)] <- NA

y <- final_corr$r

z <- x
z[upper.tri(z)] <- y[upper.tri(y, diag = F)]
y[lower.tri(y)] <- NA

mixed_matrix <- z
cor_matrix <- final_corr$r
half_cor_matrix <- y
half_n_matrix <- x
